reviews.review: Excellent film.  Kept me on the edge of my seat.  Great combination of action and comedy moments.  So many good moments in this film.  Can't wait for A4!
Amazing, everything I wanted from the accumulation of the marvel universe!

What a mess! Too many characters, no real connecting story, and emotionally hollow. The ending was completely random and simply showed thst whole thing was just a giant cash grab. Tedious, meaningless, vapid.
Fantastic how they brought the entire MCU together, and I can't wait to see where they take it
Lots of crazy stuff going on in this movie. Good action and good set up for the next one.
Thrilling from beginning to the end. The best villain since Darth Vader.
Excelent movie, all i wanted to see since 10 years now

No spoilers.  Just know this.

It is not what you expect.   You will need to have seen a bunch of the other movies previously to understand all the references.

The action is non-stop and fast paced.

It was worth every cent to see it, I will be seeing it a bunch more times...take my money.
The movie is much deeper than you realize if you take the time to dig into Thanos' reasoning and not cling to the comic book storyline.  They did something different here and that is OK.  Roll with it.

Infinity War has one of the best villain stories we have ever seen.  Best villain Marvel has done.  Vader, Joker good.  And this movie is all about the villain.  The movie is Thanos's story.  The scope of this movie is unlike anything we have seen before.  And how the story works with so many characters is impressive.  It is really a cinematic experience. With that said the huge scope and so many character does prevent it from being an all time great movie.  It is very good, but not at the same level as Black Panther, Wonder Woman, Logan or the first Avengers movie.  Saw it twice.  Late Friday with an adult audience and a Saturday matinee with a mixed audience with more young adults and kids.  With the adult audience it was more of silenced shock of WTF just happened as the end credits rolled. The younger audience you really heard the gasps and tears and a felling of more trauma as the credits roles.  The end credits scene is worth the wait and important to what comes next.  I think I will be seeing this 2 or 3 more times in the theater.  So yeah I liked it.

Infinity War was not original or exciting in any sense of the words. Generic one liner dialogue, predictable plot, same old CGI tricks, boring fight choreography, terrible editing, and forced emotional moments that have no impact on the future marvel storyline.
